entry.title: You Too Can Make a Cheap Website Quickly!
entry.summary: All it takes is a few steps to get started, and then you're all set! There's a WYSIWYG editor called Publii that you…
entry.content:
All it takes is a few steps to get started, and then you're all set! There's a WYSIWYG editor called Publii that you can install that will allow you to easily create pages to upload to a free* or inexpensive static website hosting services. 

Defined Terms

Let's start with some definitions. These terms will help you understand some of the technologies and concepts behind our approach to quickly and cheaply getting a 

  •  

*Free services usually have a hidden cost. Information about who you are, who you know, how you think, and how you behave is usually collected, analyzed and sold to advertizers so they can better tune their advertizing to hack your brain. If you can afford to pay for a service that you need, you usually should. Read more!
